transformations.headline: $ whoami --role="Enterprise Security Engineer"
transformations.tagline: > 20+ years production security operations | Status: Available
transformations.aboutIntro:
```
$ whoami --experience
> Senior Sales Engineer @ SentinelOne (2021-Present)
> SR Enterprise Sales Engineer @ McAfee (2005-2021)
> Years in production: 20+
> Specialization: Enterprise security architecture
> Credential: BBA Computer Information Systems
> Status: Available for engagement
```
transformations.experience:
```bash
$ query-achievements --format=production

DOW_30_CONVERSIONS=3
ANNUAL_REVENUE_MANAGED=$50M
LARGEST_DEPLOYMENT=500000+endpoints
MAJOR_ACCOUNTS=6 (100K+ endpoints each)
CONFERENCE_SESSIONS=highest_attended
TENURE_MCAFEE=16years

# All metrics verified in production
```

$ cat credentials.txt
Degree: Bachelor of Business Administration

Status: Verified

transformations.approach:
$ execute-workflow --mode=production
> Discovery → Architecture → POC → Validation → Deploy

contentPrinciples: Sentence length: Variable, structured like code comments or CLI output
Word choice: Technical terminology, system metaphors, engineering language
Tone: Expert practitioner, technical precision, no hand-holding

exampleContent.serviceDescription:
```
$ list-services --category=security

[enterprise-security]
  - EDR/XDR architecture (100K+ endpoints)
  - SIEM integration pipelines
  - Multi-cloud security (AWS|Azure|GCP)

[infrastructure]
  - Kubernetes cluster management
  - Terraform IaC
  - CI/CD pipeline architecture

[ai-automation]
  - LLM orchestration (1000+ hours)
  - Workflow automation (n8n)
  - Agent development
```
exampleContent.achievementStatement:
```bash
# Production metrics (verified)
export DOW_30_CONVERSIONS=3
export REVENUE_MANAGED=50000000
export MAX_ENDPOINTS=500000
export CONFERENCE_RANK="highest_attended"
echo "Status: All metrics production-verified"
```
exampleContent.skillsIntro:
```yaml
technical_stack:
  security: [EDR, XDR, SIEM, Network, Endpoint]
  cloud: [AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Docker]
  iac: [Terraform, Ansible]
  ai: [Claude, ChatGPT, Ollama, n8n]
  experience: 20+years
  status: production_ready
```
